Thx HeroMaster nice size.but i'm having soud issues,i can't hear when people are talking in game..
Me neither, if someone has the solution for the voices please tell us.

"unused game titles from consoles" means there were 4 almost identical video files with endgame credits for each console (425 Mb each). They were deleted.
As for the voices - you can open steam_rld.ini and change the last line to Language=russian. English voices will appear, but all the text will become in Russian :(
steam_api.dll missing

It's probably a false negative but AVG does detect steam_api.dll as a trojan horse, just a heads up. I've downloaded other torrents from this uploader before with no problems so I chose to ignore it and it's playing fine.

Game installs and plays perfectly. Additionally the game engine scales well so you can play it on many setups. An another note, mrGREEK360 deserves a permaIPhellban.
The console credits video files weren't ripped from this repack even though they say they were. Regardless this game fucking pisses me off -- it crashes constantly if you use your inventory/ESC menu.

JeanEmmanuel
Good for you. But I found a way to keep English voice and text. You just have to set Language=dutch in steam_rld.ini.

auximenes
The console credits video files were ripped. Just try to think a little.

For the crashes set your video options to low or "off" in every section and set the resolution to 1600*900 even though you have a good rig... There will be no difference in the graphics whatsoever.... This worked for me without any crashes to desktop....  Finally after completing the game, this is the worst game ever. Hope it helps.
